## Plot

```{r}
library(plotly)
m <- loess(unemploy / pop ~ as.numeric(date), data = economics)
p <- plot_ly(economics, x = date, y = unemploy / pop, name = "raw") 
add_trace(p, x = date, y = fitted(m), name = "loess")
```
